mapper.insert: insert into product (name, price, integral, category, stock, unit, time) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{integral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now())
mapper.select: select productid, name, price, integral, category, stock, unit, DATE_FORMAT(time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as time from product order by time desc
select productid, name, price, integral, category, stock, unit, DATE_FORMAT(time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as time from product where productid = #{productId}
select productid, name, price, integral, category, stock, unit, DATE_FORMAT(time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as time from product where category = #{category} order by time desc
select productid, name, price, integral, category, stock, unit, DATE_FORMAT(time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as time from product where name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') order by time desc
